name: Samurai Jet
description:
In this side scrolling shoot'em up arcade style game with colorful visuals, take control of your jet fighter with special abilities such as sword and shuriken strikes to battle an army of enemy flying machines.

** 5 levels with different backgrounds **

** 5 unique bosses **

** 12 enemy objects with different characteristics **

** Sound tracks **

System requirements:

Below specs are recommended as minimum for smooth game play experience: 

  • Windows 7.
  • 600 MB free disk space.
  • 2 GB RAM.
  • Quad core processor.
Personal note from developer:

This is a one person effort on very first gaming project. I enjoyed developing the game and hope you will enjoy playing it. Please do not expect mind-blowing game play/story and take it as a simple game with aim to complete levels/defeat bosses and bit previous top scores. If you come across bugs or any other problems, please do let me know and I will aim to resolve those ASAP. Finally, if you do enjoy the game, please spread the word.
